text: Tammy is a comedy movie released in 2014 directed by Ben Falcone. The movie is about the title character having a terrible day. Melissa McCarthy plays the title character. Toni Collette plays Missi. Susan Sarandon plays Pearl. Kathy Bates plays Lenore. This movie got negative reviews from many critics. It was released in July 2014. Category:Movies directed by Ben Falcone Category:2010s comedy movies Category:2014 movies
title: Tammy (movie)
